transcript: Oh, thank you, darling. The same goes for you, except that if I ever see you so much as look at another woman, I'll kill you.

segments.text: Oh, thank you, darling. The same goes for you, except that if I ever see you so much as look at another woman, I'll kill you.

metadata.transcript_ground_truth: Uhh, Thank you, darling.  And the same goes for you, except that if I ever see you so much as look at another woman, I'll kill you.
